title: Intersection of Two Arrays
content:
You are given two integer arrays, nums1 and nums2. Return an array that represents the intersection of the two arrays.

Each element in the result must be unique, and the order of elements in the result does not matter.

testCases.description: The element 2 appears in both arrays, so the intersection result contains 2.
Both 4 and 9 appear in both arrays. Any order such as 4 9 or 9 4 is acceptable.

inputFormat:
```
The first line contains integers of the first array (nums1) separated by spaces.
The second line contains integers of the second array (nums2) separated by spaces.
```
outputFormat: Print the unique elements that appear in both arrays, separated by spaces. The order does not matter.
